category.title: Hot Sandwiches
category.description: All Sandwiches are served with a choice of house made chips or coleslaw and pickles. Choice of one dipping sauce. Substitute house made chips for fries $2.00 or sweet potato fries for $2.50 or onion rings for $3.00

meals.title: Cubano
meals.description: Seasoned pulled pork, Virginia ham, Swiss, Dill pickles, mojo mustard on a pressed baguette.

meals.title: Goudapest
meals.description: Chicken breast, gouda cheese, caramelized onion, pesto, pressed on house rustic.

meals.title: Carolina Pork
meals.description: Smoked pulled pork, bbq sauce, poblano-kale slaw on a brioche bun.

meals.title: Melted Tuna
meals.description: Chunk white tuna, tomato, Swiss cheese, pressed on house rustic.*

meals.title: The Gloucester
meals.description: Fried haddock, Poblano slaw and house made tartar sauce on a brioche bun.

meals.title: Pastrami Reuben
meals.description: Shaved pastrami, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, thousand island dressing, pressed on rye.

meals.title: Try One!
meals.description: One of our signature dipping sauces: chipotle aioli, house dressing, avocado ranch, poblano ranch, BBQ, garlic aioli and honey dijon. (Extra $0.50)

meals.title: Turkey Club
meals.description: Our Triple decker Sandwich made with House made roasted turkey, sliced tomatoes, lettuce, apple wood smoked bacon and mayo served on choice of bread.

category.title: Wraps & Burgers

meals.title: Greek Wrap
meals.description: Grilled chicken, feta, cucumbers, olives, lettuce, tomato and onion with Greek dressing.

meals.title: Lamb Burger

meals.title: BBQ Burger
